```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

my_map <- eire %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(label = ~Location, 
             icon = ~myIcons[Hobby],
             clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions(freezeAtZoom = 8))
```
